channel.title: display on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in display on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Studio Display’ with 7K resolution (2 minute read) Apple is reportedly developing an Apple Studio Display with 7K resolution.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-03
item.description: Apple developing new external display that’s around half the price of the Pro Display XDR (2 minute read) Apple may be preparing to launch a new external display this year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-15
item.description: Here’s everything Apple announced at its iPhone 13 event (3 minute read) Apple has unveiled its latest line of hardware releases at its California Streaming event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-26
item.description: Google parent Alphabet launches Intrinsic: a new company to build software for industrial robots (3 minute read) Intrinsic is a new company from Alphabet that focuses on building software for industrial robots.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-07
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop Shows off the Future: Mass Transport in Floating Magnetic Pods (3 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop is developing its technology at a site in the desert just north of Las Vegas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-16
item.description: Google launches a slew of Search updates (3 minute read) Google has released several improvements that use AI to enhance its search engine, Google Lens, and other Search-related tools.
